summary: This bill, the AGOA Extension and Bilateral Engagement Act of 2025, extends the African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA), which provides trade preferences to African countries. It mandates a strategy for developing bilateral trade agreements with AGOA beneficiary countries and requires a comprehensive review of the United States' bilateral relationship with South Africa, including reports on potential sanctions and assessments of South Africa's foreign policy actions. The bill also contains technical corrections related to AGOA.
